38964.古びた ふたつの石が 並んで\n立てられている。: Two old stones stand side by side.

38965.古びた ふたつの石が\n夫婦のように 寄り添っている。\n<br>\nよく見ると:
Two old stones lean against one other like a married couple. Looking closely, there appears to be faint writing inscribed into them.
O maiden who gave her life for me. May you at least rest peacefully...
